INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 8f52084f94ac27e282931285086b68e9cb057b1f)

Table oms.Shop2DeliveryTypeDefDO

Only use to map the Express delivery type to the shops. Other types are always available, their mapping is implicit.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
DeliveryTypeDefDO deliveryTypeDefRef integer NOT_NULL  
shopDeliveryTypeName varchar(50) The shop name of the delivery type for express delivery (required if EXPRESS, otherwise ignored) 
ShopDO shopRef bigint NOT_NULL  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
